actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a credit against income tax for increasing employment.
short_title: Job Creation Tax Credit Act of 2002

summary.text: Job Creation Tax Credit Act of 2002 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an employer a credit of up to $100,000 annually for increasing employment.

titles.title: Job Creation Tax Credit Act of 2002
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a credit against income tax for increasing employment.
